summary: Vision And Scarlet Witch Finds Showrunner
title: Vision And Scarlet Witch Finds Showrunner
body:
Vision And Scarlet Witch Finds Showrunner

The Scarlet Witch (Elizabeth Olsen) limited series planned for Disney+ apparently has a new name: Vision and the Scarlet Witch. It also has a showrunner.

According to The Hollywood Reporter, Captain Marvel writer Jac Schaeffer will write the pilot and supervise the storyline of the upcoming short-run program. Avengers veterans Olsen and Paul Bettany (who plays Vision) are expected to take up…

View On WordPress

summary: Marvel question!  in the Captain Marvel trailer; Carol is seen wearing a shield cap. But shield (according to my friend I don’t...
body:
Marvel question!

 in the Captain Marvel trailer; Carol is seen wearing a shield cap. But shield (according to my friend I don’t know) wasn’t founded by that time. So what’s the deal with that? Have we missed an important detail; I can’t keep track. 

Keep in mind that I don’t understand this because it was my friend who questioned it and I have not seen Iron Man in a long time but according to her they talk about the fact that shield hasn’t been founded yet in it. I mean I don’t know but I’m sure there’s an explanation so I just wanna know if anyone’s got any idea about what I’m talking about. Cause I just confused myself.

summary:
Captain Marvel Rumor Roundup
I recently predicted that a young Rhodey might cameo in the upcoming Captain Marvel film but rumors...
body:
Captain Marvel Rumor Roundup

I recently predicted that a young Rhodey might cameo in the upcoming Captain Marvel film but rumors are coming in that a young Tony Stark might actually appear. This does not mean for certain that he would actually be in person or simply on tv or in the papers. But should he be in person depending on when in the 90s the film takes place he could appear either really young (1991) and in college as shown through the BARFing technology in Captain America: Civil War or he could look about the same (1999) already the genius billionaire playboy philanthropist as shown in the New Years Eve scene in Iron Man 3.

summary: Someone help a girl out and direct her to trustworthy sites that sell Captain Marvel content because I'm having such a hard time...
body:
Someone help a girl out and direct her to trustworthy sites that sell Captain Marvel content because I’m having such a hard time finding things for her and I kind of want to dress special for when I go see the movie when it comes out.

A lot of places say there’s clothing content out there for her but I haven’t found anything that pertains to my particular size (as in I’ve only seen children’s clothes and I am far from a child).

I’m trying to find a dress, a jacket, and a wallet & small bag. If you’ll could direct me in that direction that would really, really be great!

summary: so wait....captain marvel just surpassed “Captain America: Civil war” in advance ticket sales in the 1st 24 hours? come in at...
body:
so wait….captain marvel just surpassed “Captain America: Civil war” in advance ticket sales in the 1st 24 hours? come in at number 3 in the most tickets sold in first 24 hours for an mcu film (2.Black Panther and 1.Infinity War).

I thought you lot said this was going to be a flop.

blog.name: oxymitch
blog.title: Whatever Mitch
blog.description:
I am Mitch of Singapore, also an Ace. I enjoy reading superhero comics (especially Marvel); comic books aren't just for boys, girls read it too. However, I have no interest in any Marvel movie due to my jaded attitude, so I prefer Marvel cartoons like 90s X-Men TAS and Avengers EMH. 
Those Marvel comics I love reading are New Warriors, X-Men, Young Avengers, X-Factor, Avengers (not that Bendis era), Generation X, Avengers Academy and X-Force. 
Big fan of New Warriors and X-Men. 
My Favourite Marvel characters are...GAMBIT (Remy LeBeau), JUBILEE (Jubilation Lee), SPEEDBALL (Robbie Baldwin), WICCAN (Billy Kaplan), JUSTICE (Vance Astrovik), ROGUE (Anna Marie), SPEED (Tommy Shepherd), NIGHTCRAWLER (Kurt Wagner), FIRESTAR (Angelica Jones), QUICKSILVER (Pietro Maximoff), SHE-HULK (Jennifer Walters), QUASAR (Wendell Vaughn) and COSMO the space dog.

summary: So....Mahkizmo the disgusting ultra-sexist, chauvinistic supervillain has appeared in Captain Marvel comic. Currently, he has a...
caption:
So….Mahkizmo the disgusting ultra-sexist, chauvinistic supervillain has appeared in Captain Marvel comic. Currently, he has a new look and he calls himself…Nuclear Man. Now, it’s Captain Marvel’s turn to fight him.

Back then, Mahkizmo has clashed with the Fantastic Four in the 70s and had appeared in Byrne’s She-Hulk comic of the 90s.

- Captain Marvel v10 #1, 2019 (1st and 2nd pic)

- Sensational She-hulk v1 #38, 1992 (4th pic)

If you want to be friends, cool, let's be friends.

summary: Captain Marvel: Samuel L. Jackson ed il dolce elogio a Brie Larson
title: Captain Marvel: Samuel L. Jackson ed il dolce elogio a Brie Larson
body:
Captain Marvel: Samuel L. Jackson ed il dolce elogio a Brie Larson

Captain Marvel è sicuramente uno dei film più attesi dai fan Marvel, sia perché funzionerà come un introduzione per il potente personaggio, sia perché servirà a collegare un particolare, ed ancora sconosciuto, spunto narrativo che servirà ad Avengers: Endgame, e probabilmente un altro aiuterà a portare avanti il presunto, prossimo crossover.

Captain Marvel è tutto questo, ma è anche una…

tags: hoping to see more of caroljess tbh
summary: Loved the new Captain Marvel issue! So much Carol snark! Her banter with everyone was so on point and I am so happy to see Carol...
body:
Loved the new Captain Marvel issue! So much Carol snark! Her banter with everyone was so on point and I am so happy to see Carol back. Her back and forth with Jessica was a blessing. I’ve missed their banter and relationship.

The art was also absolutely gorgeous, here’s to hoping this team sticks around for more than 5 issues (West Coast Avengers switching artists after four issues was such a let down tbh). I’m especially glad Carol still has the buff physique she had in the other runs where her hair was short (RIP my buff space gf aesthetic). Ngl I was worried that they’d shift to the Ms Marvel look aka the supermodel body type with the change of hairstyle.

Although I’ve gotta say, I love Rhodey and I’m glad he’s back from the dead, but Carol has such a butch vibe to her that I just can’t read their relationship as romantic. Her wearing that bomber jacket and combat boots to their “date” didn’t help either lol
